#### I.I.D. Random Variables

Def. __I.I.D.__ :

* Mutually indepedent: $\forall A \subseteq [1,2,...,n], \forall (x_1,x_2,...,x_n) \in \R^n$, $F_A((x_i)_{i \in A}) = \Pi_{i \in A} F_i(x_i)$.

* Identically Distributed: $\forall i,j \in [1,2,...,n]$ and $\forall x \in \R, F_i(x) = F_j(x)$
